thing.field: The San d'Oria residential area is ahead. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
I've not told you about Mog Houses yet, have I? Would you care to learn about them now?≺Prompt≻
Care to learn about Mog Houses? ≺Selection Dialog≻Sure! No, thanks.≺Prompt≻
Mog Houses are useful places. You can recover your HP and MP, and store items there.≺Prompt≻
You can also change jobs there. All adventurers of San d'Orian citizenship are assigned a Mog House.≺Prompt≻
Make yourself at home!≺Prompt≻
The San d'Oria residential area is ahead. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
Would you like to hear about Mog Houses again?≺Prompt≻
Hmm... So be it.≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area. You'll find your Mog House within.≺Prompt≻
By the way, my records indicate that you're renting a room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi].≺Prompt≻
Would you like to check out of the room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi] and move your things back here?≺Prompt≻
Move back to San d'Oria? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes, please. No, not yet.≺Prompt≻
It is done. We've checked you out of your Rent-a-Room in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Kazham/Rabao/Norg/Al Zahbi].≺Prompt≻
All your belongings should be waiting for you inside. Those moogles are amazing creatures, are they not?≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area. Proceed to your Rent-a-Room, foreigner!≺Prompt≻
If you're already renting here, you may come and go as you please, like the Mog House in your homeland.≺Prompt≻
Ahead lies the residential area.≺Prompt≻
Wait! By law, all foreigners must lease a Rent-a-Room before entering the residential area!≺Prompt≻
Once you've registered with us, you can use it as you would a Mog House back home, wherever that may be.≺Prompt≻
Will you stay in San d'Oria? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. No, I'd rather not.≺Prompt≻
All right, then. A San d'Orian Rent-a-Room has been leased to your name. Now move along, foreigner!≺Prompt≻
You can set this as your current home point. Once you set a home point, you will return there whenever you are incapacitated.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻
Set this as current home point? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. No.≺Prompt≻
Home point set!≺Prompt≻
A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home points.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻
What will you do? ≺Selection Dialog≻Travel to another home point. Set this as your home point. Other settings. On second thought, never mind.≺Prompt≻
You have registered a new home point! You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.≺Prompt≻
You may teleport from here to any other home point you have registered.≺Possible Special Code: 00≻

(DEBUG) Flag raised, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Welcome, Master! This is your home, the “Mog House,” kupo!≺Prompt≻
I'm a moogle! We moogles like taking care of houses and items! Nice to meet you, kupo!≺Prompt≻
I'll tell you all about your Mog House, kupo!≺Prompt≻
First, the basics, kupo! Open your main menu, Master. The button at the very bottom changes to “Mog House” when you're in your Mog House, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Press it and the “Mog House” menu will appear! Everything you can do in your Mog House is there, kupo!≺Prompt≻
There are lots of things you can do in your Mog House, kupo! It can be too much for some masters, kupo...≺Prompt≻
So I'll teach you about each one of them! Ask me what you want to know about, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Choose the Mog House command you want to know about, kupo!≺Prompt≻
What do you want to know about? ≺Selection Dialog≻The Mog Safe. Storage. The Delivery Box. Changing jobs. Gardening. Changing the layout. Mog House invitations. I got it, thanks, kupo!≺Prompt≻
The Mog Safe is where I keep items that you can't carry! It's an especially secure and solid safe, kupo!≺Prompt≻
You can only put so many items in it, kupo... But I'll guard them even if it means my life, kupo!≺Prompt≻
The Delivery Box is where you can send letters to friends and receive items from various places, kupo!≺Prompt≻
You should take the items from your Delivery Box and put them in your inventory when they arrive, kupo!≺Prompt≻
If your Delivery Box is full, no more deliveries can be made, and you can't send any mail either, kupo!≺Prompt≻
You can send items and gil to your friends with the “Send” command, kupo!≺Prompt≻
(Sometimes, if a special force takes hold, you can even deliver items with the "Exclusive" attribute, kupo...!)≺Prompt≻
Changing people's jobs is a secret ability only we moogles can use, kupo!≺Prompt≻
I take off all your equipment and take you to a mysterious place, kupo!≺Prompt≻
And...the rest is a secret, kupo!≺Prompt≻
All moogles like taking care of plants, kupo!≺Prompt≻
As long as you have a flowerpot and seeds, I'll make it my personal responsibility to look after the plants you raise, kupo!≺Prompt≻
This Mog House is your very own room, kupo! But it's still a little bare, kupo...≺Prompt≻
It needs some furniture and maybe some paintings to make it more cozy, kupo!≺Prompt≻
If you find any during your travels, I'll help you lay them out, kupo! I can't wait, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Storage space becomes available when you place furniture in your Mog House using the “Layout” command, kupo!≺Prompt≻
It's almost exactly the same as using your Mog Safe, kupo! Leave your items here for me to look after, kupo!≺Prompt≻
You can invite party and alliance members into your Mog House, kupo!≺Prompt≻
You can show off your expensive furniture, have tea parties, plan your next great adventure--the possibilities are endless, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Are you sure, kupo? You know everything about your Mog House, kupo?≺Prompt≻
Are you sure? ≺Selection Dialog≻I'm sure! Maybe I'm not so sure...≺Prompt≻
Okay, kupo! Good luck on your adventuring, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Do you want me to teach you about your Mog House again, kupo?≺Prompt≻
Ask about your Mog House again? ≺Selection Dialog≻Don't ask. Ask.≺Prompt≻
Over the mountains and the rolling hills, I'll go wherever my master wills.♪≺Prompt≻
Master! I traveled all the way here at your bidding, kupo! Even a Rent-a-Room needs a moogle, kupo!≺Prompt≻
But there are a few things you can't do in a Rent-a-Room, kupo. Select “Mog House” from the main menu and check, kupo!≺Prompt≻
When you go back home, talk to the guard in front of the residential area to call me back to the Mog House, kupo!≺Prompt≻
Master! I have something to tell you, kupo!≺Prompt≻

When using a Gold World Pass to invite a friend to this world, both you and your friend will be eligible for special benefits.≺Prompt≻
A Gold World Pass cannot be used if your account has more than one character.≺Prompt≻
A Gold World Pass can be used to invite one person per pass. As with the standard World Pass, a new pass cannot be issued until the current pass expires.≺Prompt≻

Both the inviter and the invitee will be eligible to receive special items; the invitee five times (once immediately following the generation of a character using the Gold World Pass, followed by 40 days, 70 days, 100 days, and 365 days subsequent to that date) and the inviter four times (the same occasions as the invitee, excluding the time of initial character generation).≺Prompt≻
Special items can be received by forming a two-person party that includes the inviting and invited character, then choosing the option “Gold World Pass benefits.”≺Prompt≻
It is possible to put special items on hold to be received at a later date. However, please be aware that the following sequence of actions will render you unable to receive your gift.≺Prompt≻
(1) The invitee accepts the item, but you do not. (2) You claim an item for the same anniversary, but with a different invitee.≺Prompt≻
There is no limit to the number of Gold World Passes that can be issued to a person, but please be aware that a character can only receive special items from up to fifteen invites.≺Prompt≻

What is your business? ≺Selection Dialog≻Would you cast Signet on me? I want to spend my conquest points. ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[I want to join the Expeditionary Force./Teleport me to the E.F. area.] I want to quit the E.F./change my E.F. I want to go on a supplies quest. I have some questions... Nothing, sorry to bother you.≺Prompt≻

What do you wish to know about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Nothing. Conquests. Conquest results. Donating crystals. Conquest points. The effects of controlling regions. Regions controlled by other nations. Regions under beastman control.≺Prompt≻

All three nations are striving daily to put more regions under their control. This is what we call “conquests.” You can take part in it and serve your country by defeating enemies while you have Signet cast on you.≺Prompt≻
Each region comprises several areas, and the nation that rids those areas of the most monsters gains control of the region.≺Prompt≻
Nations receive goods and resources from regions under their control.≺Prompt≻
So, the more regions we control, the richer our nation becomes.≺Prompt≻
Border guards are also placed in outposts within regions under our control. They are there to cast Signet on adventurers like yourself.≺Prompt≻
Once you have your nation's Signet, you will be able to acquire crystals from enemies you defeat.≺Prompt≻

Not only that, but you will also receive conquest points. You get more conquest points if you defeat enemies in regions that are not under your nation's control. These points can be used to purchase items from guards like myself.≺Prompt≻
So you see...conquests benefit nations and adventurers alike. We expect you to do your best to serve your country.≺Prompt≻

You can see the current state of conquests by selecting “Region Info” from the main menu. Conquest results in all regions are regularly recalculated, so you may want to check them from time to time.≺Prompt≻
Shops in our city will be selling different items according to our conquest rank. The Troupe Valeriano will also visit the nation that finishes first and bring a little joy to its citizens.≺Prompt≻
You can donate crystals to your nation once you achieve rank 2. Just trade them to guards like myself, and we will ensure they are sent to the proper place.≺Prompt≻
We would like you to donate crystals to your nation from now on. Just trade them to guards like myself, and we will ensure they are sent to the proper place.≺Prompt≻
You can acquire crystals by defeating enemies while you have your nation's Signet. Having Signet cast on you is also the only way of taking part in conquests.≺Prompt≻
Rank points will be awarded to you for each crystal you donate, and you may be offered new missions as your rank goes up.≺Prompt≻
You also receive rank points for completing missions. Complete missions and take part in conquests to raise your rank and serve your country.≺Prompt≻
You are awarded conquest points when you defeat monsters while you are taking part in conquests. Select "Region Info" from the menu to check your current number of conquest points.≺Prompt≻
You can purchase items from guards like myself with your conquest points, but be warned that the number of points you spend will be subtracted from your current total.≺Prompt≻

When conquest results are announced, you will be told which country controls the region you are in at that time. Sometimes regions may become neutral, or beastmen may even gain control of regions.≺Prompt≻
If we gain control of a region, border guards will be placed at its outposts to help adventurers like you.≺Prompt≻
Merchants will also be placed there, and goods from that region will find their way to the local shops here.≺Prompt≻
Gaining control of regions is the basic principle behind conquests. We need each of you to do your best, and bring our nation to the top of the ranks.≺Prompt≻
Of course, sometimes we lose regions to other nations...so we must try to take them back before the next conquest results are announced.≺Prompt≻
As an incentive, we will award you with more conquest points for defeating monsters in those regions.≺Prompt≻

But if we are allied with another nation, you will only be awarded the regular rate for defeating monsters in our allies' regions. On the other hand, we will award you with more points for fighting in the top-ranked nation's regions.≺Prompt≻
Our paramount concern lies in the beastmen gaining control of our regions. If too many of us are defeated in a region, the beastmen will gain control of it.≺Prompt≻
If this happens, not only is it a great blow to our pride, but you will be unable to acquire any crystals in that region.≺Prompt≻
The beastmen are a menace to all nations. If they rise to power, we must all unite and drive those vile creatures from that region.≺Prompt≻
We need you to bring supplies to the outpost border guards who are placed in regions under our control.≺Prompt≻
There is one outpost in each region. Select “Region Info” from the menu, and look for the areas with a small flag mark on the map. That is where they are.≺Prompt≻

Here are the supplies. Just give them to the guard at the outpost and your mission will be complete. Now, choose which outpost you want to go to. We give different rewards for each region, so choose carefully.≺Prompt≻

I am looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!≺Prompt≻

Currently our nation is dispatching Expeditionary Forces across Vana'diel, and requests the participation of brave adventurers such as yourself.≺Prompt≻

Requirements for participating in an E.F. are simple. Your party must consist of ≺Numeric Parameter 5≻ members. Each member must be from this country, rank 3 or higher, and have reached a sufficient level.≺Prompt≻
Once your party is ready, come to me and I will teleport you to the nearest outpost.≺Prompt≻
There, you will receive an insignia of the Expeditionary Force. When you succeed in taking control of the area, you can exchange the insignia for your reward.≺Prompt≻

I say! Watch where you're going!≺Prompt≻
Oh, a new recruit, are you? That explains it!≺Prompt≻
Well, far be it from me to chastise someone on ≺Multiple Choice (Player Gender)≻[his/her] first day. Still, as a citizen of San d'Oria, you--≺Prompt≻
Ah, Avandale! What are you doing there?≺Prompt≻
Prince Trion, I was explaining to this recruit here about what it means to be a proud citizen of San d'Oria!≺Prompt≻
A new recruit? Strengthen your sword arm and your stature as a knight. Thus will you best serve the glory of our great kingdom.≺Prompt≻
San d'Oria has more than enough soldiers already, brother. Speaking of which, should you not be training them, instead of bothering new recruits with talk of war?≺Prompt≻
You are too bold!≺Prompt≻
Really, Pieuje! Is that any way to speak to your brother?≺Prompt≻
I've said the truth, nothing more. The ranks of our armies could swell to bursting, and victory would still be far.≺Prompt≻
It is your head that is swollen, brother. With enough numbers, we could crush the beastmen! And without having to resort to your misguided tactics!≺Prompt≻
My tactics, misguided? Oh, that is rich! Tell me of the tactics that lost an entire company in Batallia Downs the other day?≺Prompt≻
It's good you're so fond of talking, as I've never seen you wield a sword! Better to shout orders from the rear than reveal your ineptitude in actual combat!≺Prompt≻
Stop your quarreling, both of you!≺Prompt≻
A divided leadership only creates unrest among the people, soldier and civilian alike. Surely you are both aware of this?≺Prompt≻
Oh, I suppose. I warn you, Pieuje, talk to me that way again and I won't be so forgiving.≺Prompt≻
Good old Trion. Threats of violence are his only recourse when a conversation does not go his way. Like a child, he is!≺Prompt≻
They are both like children, quick to insult and quicker to take offense! Really...≺Prompt≻
I must apologize for that. But ours is truly a great kingdom, and I expect you to further her glory.≺Prompt≻
Those two are a handful, but they truly are the closest of brothers.≺Prompt≻
Perhaps I could be of service. Is there anything in particular you'd like to know?≺Prompt≻
Something you'd like to know? ≺Selection Dialog≻Nothing, actually. I'd like to get out of the city. I'd like to do some shopping. Tell me more about adventuring.≺Prompt≻
Just got here and you're aching to leave, eh? Listen, the lands are wild beyond our gates, filled with fiends and their ilk.≺Prompt≻
But if you must go, take those stairs, head for Northern San d'Oria, then go out Ranperre Gate. You'll need to go down Laborman's Way, then take a right to get to the gate.≺Prompt≻
If you need any help with directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.≺Prompt≻
Wait, wait! One more thing. If someone aids you, be sure to show them your gratitude. That is all.≺Prompt≻
If you want to buy weapons or other supplies, just ask one of the merchants in town.≺Prompt≻
Ahh, recruits... Don't know which way to hold a sword and you think you're ready for adventures. Well, what would you like to know?≺Prompt≻
You need to go to the Novice's Hall. You'll find it in Southern San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
What would you like to know? ≺Selection Dialog≻Helping people. Hunting monsters. Making easy money. Working for my country.≺Prompt≻
Ah, a commendable choice! Come to think of it, there was a lady in front of a house on Pikeman's Way. She may be in need of assistance.≺Prompt≻
Ah, a commendable choice! Hmm, yes... Come to think of it, there was a lady just down those stairs. She may be in need of assistance.≺Prompt≻
Ahh, recruits... Don't know your own limits until a fiend beats it into your head for you. Very well. How about gathering some hides?≺Prompt≻
From Northern San d'Oria, pass through Victory Arch to enter Southern San d'Oria. There you'll find the Tanners' Guild. They need hides every now and then.≺Prompt≻
If you have trouble finding the Tanners' Guild, just ask around.≺Prompt≻
Easy money, eh? Typical of a new recruit. I cannot promise ease, but try the lumberyard in Northern San d'Oria. Should be enough work for you there.≺Prompt≻
Go up those stairs there to get to Northern San d'Oria. You'll find the lumberyard near the top.≺Prompt≻
Ah, a commendable choice. Head to any city gate and inquire at the gatehouse. They'll give you work befitting your rank.≺Prompt≻

All right, then! I am ready to eat!≺Prompt≻
Welcome. What'll it be?≺Prompt≻
I clearly heard that the knights were planning a strike on those Ghelsba Orcs. Whatever came of that?≺Prompt≻
Well, how could the two princes possibly organize a raid? They can't even agree on the color of the sky!≺Prompt≻
Then, is it true that the first prince to quell the Orcs of Ghelsba will inherit the Kingdom?≺Prompt≻
Bah. Simply taking Ghelsba won't make anybody king.≺Prompt≻
Aye, but he'd be a step closer to the throne! Still, it must be in their blood to quarrel.≺Prompt≻
It's been twenty years since the Great War, and the king is old. His little princes have grown into men, now...≺Prompt≻
Yet I hear they bicker over which will be king. A sadder fate has never befell a kingdom, if it's true.≺Prompt≻
Who knows? And they were such good brothers in their youth.≺Prompt≻
Aye, 'tis true that San d'Oria joined Windurst, Bastok, and Jeuno in war twenty years ago. We slew the Shadow Lord, and drove back his hordes!≺Prompt≻
I say “we,” but what did the absent-minded Windurstians and granite-licking Bastokers do? Nothing! And don't get me started on those upstart fishermen from Jeuno!≺Prompt≻
Our knights triumphed against darkness that day. San d'Oria saved this world from the clutches of the Shadow Lord!≺Prompt≻
Soon, our great kingdom will bring peace to this land! Fight with me, my brothers, until that glorious day has come!≺Prompt≻
Egads, I'm hungry! I feel faint...≺Prompt≻
Bring meat! Any meat, I say! I'm just back from a long march, and I hunger!≺Prompt≻
I am terribly sorry, sir. We've run out of meat, you see--≺Prompt≻
Out of meat! Well I...I guess there's no helping that now, is there? What else have you got?≺Prompt≻
We...have the usual. I'll bring it right out.≺Prompt≻
By Altana! Not beans again...≺Prompt≻
I'm afraid so...≺Prompt≻
Please! I've had naught but beans for weeks!≺Prompt≻
And a belly full of beans doesn't satisfy.≺Prompt≻

Aye, there hasn't been a war since the beastmen rose twenty years ago. I tried to settle down, and sold off my armor for some city clothes.≺Prompt≻
But this son of adventurers couldn't give up his heritage for steady work. Not for lack of trying, mind you!≺Prompt≻
Always got into fights with superiors, or quit at the first hint of boredom. Come to think of it, I've gotten nowhere, have I?≺Prompt≻

Are you confident in your faith? Somewhere out there lies the gate to eternal paradise.≺Prompt≻

I'll not let it happen again! Not while blood still flows through my veins!≺Prompt≻

Welcome to the auction house. Do you have any questions about our establishment?≺Prompt≻

What do you want to know? ≺Selection Dialog≻What is the auction house? How are auctions run? Are there any fees? Are there any limits? How do you check up on merchandise? How do you remove an item? My “Sales Status” list is full! Nothing right now.≺Prompt≻
Auction houses can be found in all of Vana'diel's major cities. Here adventurers gather to bid on battle spoils, unwanted items, old armor...almost anything.≺Prompt≻
Currently, the auction houses in Bastok, San d'Oria, Windurst, and Jeuno all work independently. Therefore, prices differ from city to city.≺Prompt≻
Adventurers may use any auction house regardless of nationality.≺Prompt≻
The first adventurer to bid at or above the asking price will automatically purchase the product.≺Prompt≻
Once put up for auction, merchandise will remain there for a maximum of thirty weeks Vana'diel time (nine-and-a-half days Earth time).≺Prompt≻
If merchandise does not sell within this time limit, it will be returned to the seller's current residence.≺Prompt≻
Transaction fees are proportional to the amount for which an item is put up on auction. The method of calculating this fee is different for single items and stackable items.≺Prompt≻
A transaction fee is collected when any merchandise is put up for auction. This fee is nonrefundable.≺Prompt≻
The International Auction House Committee, or IAHC, has declared that a maximum of seven items may be put up for auction at one time.≺Prompt≻
However, the IAHC has recently removed the limit to how many items one may purchase.≺Prompt≻
A small amount of time is required before new merchandise appears on our bid list.≺Prompt≻
Once an item appears on your “Sales Status” list, it may not immediately appear on the bid list. If you do not see your item on the bid list, try looking again at a later time.≺Prompt≻
If you would like to withdraw an item from an auction, you must travel to the auction house, and select “Stop Sale” from the “Sales Status” menu.≺Prompt≻
To remove an item from your “Sales Status” list, you must visit an auction counter to acknowledge the sale or return of your merchandise.≺Prompt≻
Otherwise, previously sold or returned items will fill up your list and prevent you from selling any more merchandise.≺Prompt≻
At any auction counter, open the “Sales Status” menu and acknowledge the transaction to clear it from the list.≺Prompt≻
Press the confirm button to remove any transaction colored yellow (sold) or red (returned).≺Prompt≻
Is there anything else you would like to know?≺Prompt≻
In the past, many have amassed great wealth through the auction house. I hope you find fortune, too!≺Prompt≻
I wonder who that beautiful young lass is waiting for every day and every night down by the docks...≺Prompt≻

The WES (World Emigration Service) is currently taking applications for those who wish to immigrate to another World.≺Prompt≻
When applying, please note the following:≺Prompt≻

You can always cancel your emigration during the application period by talking to any of the WES agents located conveniently about Vana'diel. However, once the period is over, you will no longer be able to cancel.≺Prompt≻
After immigrating to another World, you will not be allowed to return to your previous World. Also, emigration is only allowed during periods when the WES is accepting applications.≺Prompt≻

You will be unable to choose the World to which you wish to emigrate. For more information on Worlds that we are accepting emigration applications for, please check the current PlayOnline news.≺Prompt≻
If your character happens to have the same name as another player in the World to which you emigrate, you will have to change your name before entering that World.≺Prompt≻
Emigration of characters is done one at a time.≺Prompt≻
If you request emigration for any of your other characters, please conduct all applications separately.≺Prompt≻
All items up for auction and in your Delivery Box will be lost when you emigrate. Please collect these items before moving.≺Prompt≻
Any items in your Mog Safe will be transported with you to the new World.≺Prompt≻
Any linkshells, linkpearls, and pearl sacks will be destroyed at the time of emigration. However, linkshell owners will be presented with a new, unopened linkshell.≺Prompt≻
Finally, all markers placed on your maps will be erased.≺Prompt≻

It was just some old armor that wasn't of any real value to me.≺Prompt≻

This kind of criminal is more than the merchants can deal with. We need an adventurer who's no stranger to battle. Your reward will be twenty percent of the selling price of the armor. Come back here when you have it.≺Prompt≻
The boss doesn't take no for an answer. Actually, he usually doesn't give you a chance to answer... But for this job, you can't help but take his side in the matter.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to know about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Basic rules. Official/private matches. Flammen-Brenner. Flamme. Match score. Petras and quarrying. Sprint. KO. Return.≺Prompt≻
The basic rules of Brenner are as follows:≺Prompt≻
First, the participants divide into two teams. Each side's camp contains the same number of “Flammen-Brenner.”≺Prompt≻
At the beginning of the match, half of each side's Flammen-Brenner will be ablaze with “Flamme,” or flame, while the other half will remain unlit.≺Prompt≻
Participants can seize a Flamme from the opposing side's Flammen-Brenner and carry it around the Isle.≺Prompt≻
The goal is to steal your opponent's Flamme and use them to light your side's Flammen-Brenner.≺Prompt≻
The side that succeeds in lighting all of its Flammen-Brenner will be declared the winner after a specified amount of time.≺Prompt≻
If neither side is victorious before the match ends, the outcome will be judged based on the score. The “match score” section of the rulebook contains more information on this subject.≺Prompt≻
Brenner is significantly divided into public and private matches. Official matches are held periodically according to level and feature general participation.≺Prompt≻
You cannot reserve the Isle when an official match is being held.≺Prompt≻
No items are necessary for participation, but a minor fee will be collected. You will be unable to participate if your level is too low.≺Prompt≻

The match outcome will be recorded unless the number of participants fails to exceed ≺Numeric Parameter 0≻ members, or if there are fewer than ≺Numeric Parameter 1≻ members in a match where the two sides' numbers differ. In such cases, the game will be considered a training match and will not be recorded.≺Prompt≻
Private matches require a reservation, and participation may be limited. The ≺Set Color #5≻Master of Ceremonies≺Set Color #1≻ (MC) can freely adjust the rules and control match proceedings.≺Prompt≻
“LS Liga” is a form of private match. You can learn more about LS Liga by speaking to a Marshal.≺Prompt≻
A Flammen-Brenner is a device that contains a Flamme (flame). The Flammen-Brenner is covered by a grate that will open after taking a set amount of damage, exposing the Flamme.≺Prompt≻
The participants must utilize this chance to seize the Flamme before the grate recloses. Once the grate is closed, the Flammen-Brenner will begin recovering from the damage it has been dealt.≺Prompt≻
If you manage to open the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner and capture their Flamme, you should make haste to light one of the Flammen-Brenner on your side.≺Prompt≻
After a certain amount of time, the Flamme will burn out and the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner will be relit.≺Prompt≻
Also, please note that you cannot quicken your pace using any special abilities while you are in possession of a Flamme.≺Prompt≻
In the event that neither side fulfills the conditions for victory, the outcome of the match will be evaluated based on score.≺Prompt≻

Ten points are awarded to each side for every lit Flammen-Brenner, while one point is awarded whenever a Flamme is captured, used to light a Flammen-Brenner, or recaptured from an opponent. One point is also awarded for protecting the Flammen-Brenner for a certain period of time.≺Prompt≻

Like Ballista, ≺Set Color #5≻quarry≺Set Color #1≻ (/quarry) can be used while playing Brenner. Participants may use this ability to dig up ≺Set Color #5≻Petras≺Set Color #1≻ and temporary items.≺Prompt≻

However, unlike Ballista Petras, Brenner Petras have no effect on the match score. You can ≺Set Color #5≻trade≺Set Color #1≻ a Petra to a Pursuivant to recover your HP and MP at no expense to TP.≺Prompt≻
≺Set Color #5≻Sprint≺Set Color #1≻ cannot be used while carrying a Petra. Also, please note that the ≺Set Color #5≻scout≺Set Color #1≻ ability cannot be used in Brenner.≺Prompt≻
Petras will be lost in the event of a KO, but can be carried over from one match to another.≺Prompt≻
The ≺Set Color #5≻sprint≺Set Color #1≻ (/sprint) ability can be used to increase the player's speed when not in possession of a Flamme or Petras.≺Prompt≻
In the event of a KO, you will be returned to your team's camp. However, recovery will take longer the more often you fall in battle.≺Prompt≻
In other words, you will receive a penalty if you fall immediately after recovering from KO. In addition, your TP will be reduced to zero and you will lose any Petras in your possession.≺Prompt≻

Festival time, kupo～!!! We moogles have come up with a new game for you to enjoy called "Azimuth Circle"!≺Prompt≻
Azimuth Circle is played in pairs! First, find a partner and make a party, kupo!≺Prompt≻
After you've done that, try to find a certain checkpoint located in this town! There are many checkpoints, but only one right answer, kupo!≺Prompt≻
However...you can only check three points, kupo! But don't worry--once you've checked a point, you can look at it again any number of times!≺Prompt≻
At each location lies a compass that points in the direction of your partner's special checkpoint! The directions will be indicated from the viewpoint of your partner, kupo～.≺Prompt≻
Find both of your special checkpoints and exchange the items you receive from them! Bring those items to us. We will give you a reward in exchange, kupo!≺Prompt≻
That's all there is to it, kupo! To participate, make a party of two and talk to a moogle!≺Prompt≻

That's all there is to it, kupo! Your partner seems to already be participating in the game. If you want to play together, ask your partner to cancel the current game and talk to a moogle again!≺Prompt≻
Will you participate in Azimuth Circle with your partner, kupo?≺Prompt≻

≺Possible Special Code: 1F≻≺Possible Special Code: 0F≻≺Player Name≻'s badge flashes brightly.≺Prompt≻
I must say, things are rather lively in town today. Do you not agree, Regine?≺Prompt≻
With all the people coming in and out, I find myself hoping some rich red mage without a spell to her name might wander in and purchase our entire stock...≺Prompt≻

Just when you think a customer has finally appeared, they flash that silly badge and begin prattling about the “Empire of Aht Urhgan.” As if we would know anything about such an exotic country.≺Prompt≻
Who would dream that either of us had even traveled beyond the borders of San d'Oria? Do they believe we are like the Tavnazians of old and maintain trading partners in the Near East?≺Prompt≻
I hear the town of Al Zahbi, a strategic location in the west of Aht Urhgan, often finds itself surrounded by invading beastman forces... What feeble defenses they must have in the Near East.≺Prompt≻
This is what comes of a nation that does not embrace the path of chivalry. Our heroic knights would make short work of any beastman horde, no matter their number! Long live King Destin!≺Prompt≻
Hmph, thinking of becoming a mercenary, are you? Let me give you some advice: The beastmen of the Near East are far more savage than the fiends of Ronfaure.≺Prompt≻
I would avoid those lands until I was sure of my strength. They care not who they kill--in that respect, they are much like the Orcs.≺Prompt≻
In war, survival is key. Picking your battles is also a valid strategy.≺Prompt≻
That's called “Knowing your enemy,” that is!≺Prompt≻
Yeah! “Knowing your anemone!”≺Prompt≻
I hear frightful tales from the Near East. They say that the beastmen are leading armies into the lands of people.≺Prompt≻
That badge... It is as if the terrible events of twenty years past have returned to haunt us...≺Prompt≻
Yes, the nation they speak of lies far away, yet I feel the seed of fear blossom in my heart. War is like a raging fire that leaps from country to country, consuming all in its path...≺Prompt≻
I wonder what culinary delights grace the tables of the Near East.≺Prompt≻
The rice dish “pilaf” is rumored to be delicious. All those exotic spices...≺Prompt≻
<Rumble...> Oh! It seems I have awoken the beast of my appetite with all these gastronomic musings!≺Prompt≻
Hm...≺Prompt≻
I do not remember ever seeing you before. What do you need of me?≺Prompt≻
Show him Leleroon's letter? ≺Selection Dialog≻Yes. Not now.≺Prompt≻
Well now, what have we here? I have not seen Leleroon in a long time. I wonder how the little Qiqirn is doing...≺Prompt≻
You are a member of the Seagull Phratrie, correct? Sorry for my curt words earlier.≺Prompt≻
I was a member of the Black Cradle's crew until that giant hole was blown into its hull... Then I ventured here to San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
As the oldest member, all the battles were starting to take their toll on me. So when the ship sank, I took the opportunity to retire.≺Prompt≻
You came here in order to get some quality corsair armor, did you?≺Prompt≻

Well then, you have come to the right place. I can make ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ｆ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ for you.≺Prompt≻
However, first I must test your skill as a corsair and determine that you are up to my standard. Until now, I have created equipment for Qultada only.≺Prompt≻
You have met Qultada, have you not?≺Prompt≻
When I decided to abandon life at sea, the fool tried desperately to stop me.≺Prompt≻
Anyway, that is all in the past.≺Prompt≻

I cannot do anything until you bring me the materials first.≺Prompt≻
Come back after you manage to find them.≺Prompt≻
Ah, I see you've managed to find all the materials. Good work.≺Prompt≻
All you have to do now is pay the costs of production.≺Prompt≻
That will be ≺Numeric Parameter 5≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Speaker Name≻)ｅ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ｄ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻...≺Prompt≻
I am not going anywhere. Just bring the materials whenever you want.≺Prompt≻
Well, this is an unexpected development...≺Prompt≻
I guess I will have to actually make your equipment, then! Please wait a while until I can finish.≺Prompt≻
Patience, now, patience. Hasty work makes sloppy work.≺Prompt≻
The way of the corsair means being able to show the world an easygoing smile in the most anxious of times.≺Prompt≻
So relax and wait just a bit longer.≺Prompt≻
Here you go... A genuine ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#ｆ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, all for you.≺Prompt≻
Ah, the corsairs... Those were the days...≺Prompt≻
Qultada and I had many a disagreement on that ship. I used to have more of a temper.≺Prompt≻
I thought we should stop hounding the Empire.≺Prompt≻
I often disagreed with his methods, and eventually left the Phratrie because of it.≺Prompt≻
Now that I am here on land, though, I am starting to understand his ideas, too. I have had a lot to think about...≺Prompt≻
It seems to me that a captain is a lot like the sea breeze...≺Prompt≻
Leading a storm of a crew... Pressing ever forward over the seas...≺Prompt≻
You know Qultada, so you must know what I mean.≺Prompt≻
That man can be like a hurricane...≺Prompt≻
When you came to visit me the other day, I felt the same qualities in you.≺Prompt≻
Such memories make me long to return to life on the endless waves...≺Prompt≻
Please give everyone my blessings.≺Prompt≻
I can no longer sail, but I have no doubt that you and your companions will shape a new path for the corsairs.≺Prompt≻

This is the basic care plan for your chocobo. Under this plan, we will provide for your chocobo's most fundamental needs.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to give your chocobo a long rest. This will revitalize its energy and accelerate its recovery from injury or illness.≺Prompt≻
We can take your chocobo out on a walk through the safe areas of town. This should improve its physical condition.≺Prompt≻
Listening to music will make your chocobo a more refined creature, and should improve its mental condition.≺Prompt≻
Exercising alone will improve your chocobo's strength, but will have a slightly negative effect on its mental condition.≺Prompt≻
Exercising in a group will improve your chocobo's stamina, but will have a slightly negative effect on its mental condition.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with children will improve your chocobo's intelligence, but will have a slightly negative effect on its physical condition.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with other chocobos will improve your chocobo's receptivity, but will have a slightly negative effect on its physical condition.≺Prompt≻
You can earn some money by having your chocobo deliver packages for the guilds.≺Prompt≻
Carrying heavy loads will improve its physical condition, but will inflict a certain amount of stress on the animal.≺Prompt≻
You can exhibit your chocobo to the public. We will provide you with a monetary token of gratitude for this service.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with the public will improve its mental condition, but will inflict a certain amount of stress on the animal.≺Prompt≻
You can send your chocobo to deliver official messages. The nation will compensate you for your services.≺Prompt≻
Carrying someone on its back for a long period of time will build strength in your chocobo's legs, but will place some strain on the animal.≺Prompt≻
You can send your chocobo to dig for items to benefit the stables. We will thank you for your contribution with a certain amount of gil.≺Prompt≻
Digging for treasure will improve your chocobo's intelligence, but will place some strain on the animal and may decrease its stamina.≺Prompt≻
Your chocobo can even appear in plays. This will require your chocobo to perform simple acts and will improve its receptivity.≺Prompt≻
You will receive a gil payment for this service, but appearing in a play will have a negative effect on the animal's strength and will place some strain on your chocobo.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻The Vana'diel Chocobo Society. Time required. Chocobo attributes. Care schedule. Caring for your chocobo. Feed. Abilities and personality. Retirement. Matchmaking. Calling chocobos in the field. Items. Lost chicks. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Just let me know if you ever get curious!≺Prompt≻
The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.≺Prompt≻
They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.≺Prompt≻
Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.≺Prompt≻
Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.≺Prompt≻
They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.≺Prompt≻
But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!≺Prompt≻
Ask about which attribute? ≺Selection Dialog≻Strength. Endurance. Discernment. Receptivity. Energy. Affection. Satisfaction. Nothing.≺Prompt≻

“Strength” is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.≺Prompt≻
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”≺Prompt≻
“Endurance” is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.≺Prompt≻
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”≺Prompt≻
“Discernment” is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.≺Prompt≻
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”≺Prompt≻

“Receptivity” is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.≺Prompt≻
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”≺Prompt≻

“Energy” is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!≺Prompt≻
“Affection” is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!≺Prompt≻
You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.≺Prompt≻

If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.≺Prompt≻
“Satisfaction” is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.≺Prompt≻
However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻What is a care schedule? Basic care. Resting. Taking a walk. Listening to music. Exercising alone. Exercising in a group. Interacting with children. Interacting with chocobos. Carrying packages. Exhibiting to the public. Delivering messages. Digging for treasure. Acting in a play. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.≺Prompt≻
How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.≺Prompt≻
You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).≺Prompt≻
When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.≺Prompt≻
With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.≺Prompt≻
The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.≺Prompt≻
You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.≺Prompt≻
However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.≺Prompt≻

We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.≺Prompt≻
Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.≺Prompt≻
However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.≺Prompt≻
But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.≺Prompt≻
If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!≺Prompt≻
The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.≺Prompt≻

You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.≺Prompt≻
The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!≺Prompt≻
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.≺Prompt≻
The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.≺Prompt≻
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.≺Prompt≻
You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.≺Prompt≻
What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻A general explanation. Watching over your chocobo. Telling a story. Scolding. Competing. Taking a walk. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.≺Prompt≻
Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.≺Prompt≻
On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.≺Prompt≻
However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.≺Prompt≻
You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.≺Prompt≻
Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.≺Prompt≻
You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.≺Prompt≻
I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)≺Prompt≻
Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.≺Prompt≻
This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.≺Prompt≻
You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.≺Prompt≻
I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.≺Prompt≻
Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!≺Prompt≻
What would you like to know about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Why feeding is important. Vegetables. Wildgrasses. Carrots. Worms. Medicines. Pastes. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.≺Prompt≻
However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.≺Prompt≻
At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!≺Prompt≻
Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.≺Prompt≻
There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!≺Prompt≻
Just ≺Set Color #5≻trade≺Set Color #1≻ the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.≺Prompt≻
This is the standard variety of chocobo feed, among which ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are most popular.≺Prompt≻

Chocobos also seem to enjoy ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
These greens are the most effective in satisfying a chocobo's hunger. Chocobos also enjoy the taste, which raises affection for their owner.≺Prompt≻
Wildgrasses are a type of medicinal herb. They do not taste very good, but are highly effective at curing status abnormalities.≺Prompt≻

For example, ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will dramatically increase your chocobo's affection, and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will restore its energy.≺Prompt≻
But watch out for the side effects... Give the chocobo a worm at the wrong time, and all your effort could come to nothing...≺Prompt≻

The most curious of all the worms is the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. At first it may not seem to have any effect, but looks are deceiving...≺Prompt≻
Medicines can cure a chocobo in the blink of an eye.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ will restore your chocobo's energy in full, making it easier to care for and ensuring that the care schedule goes smoothly.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ are effective for most status abnormalities, restoring instant health to your chocobo. Of course, you still need to continue caring for your chocobo so it can fully recover.≺Prompt≻
A potion can also help fill a chocobo's stomach, so they can be useful when you are short on feed.≺Prompt≻
Feed can be ground into paste for chicks to eat.≺Prompt≻
You can make paste yourself with some cooking skill. If you don't have enough cooking skill yourself, then you might want to ask a friend to make some for you.≺Prompt≻
Chicks can also eat regular feed, though.≺Prompt≻
Which would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻Abilities. Temperament. Weather preferences. Nothing.≺Prompt≻
Your chocobo may learn useful abilities during the course of its life at the stables.≺Prompt≻
For example, Auto-Regen will increase the rate at which your chocobo restores energy. Such an ability is sure to come in handy in a variety of situations.≺Prompt≻
Your chocobo learns abilities by listening to your words, so if you know of any story that you think might interest the animal, you should tell it often.≺Prompt≻
But remember, your chocobo can't learn all of the abilities there are. It can only learn two...or at least, that's what I read.≺Prompt≻
The chocobo's temperament is determined when it is just a chick. Its temperament and attributes are somehow related, but I'm not really sure how.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos generally like sunny days, but they could grow to like other kinds of weather depending on how they are raised.≺Prompt≻
Chocobos pay attention to the air outside when they go on walks, and grow to prefer that type of weather because of the memories.≺Prompt≻

Make the animal's schedule around its preferred weather days, and plans are more likely to succeed. However, if the chocobo has a favored type of weather, it also dislikes certain conditions, creating a weak point to watch for.≺Prompt≻
You can choose to retire your chocobo at any time after it has fully matured.≺Prompt≻
After retirement, the VCS will take up caring for the chocobo where you left off, so you need not worry about its welfare.≺Prompt≻

When your chocobo retires, you will receive ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Be sure not to lose it.≺Prompt≻

You can use the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to register your chocobo to call in the field or for matchmaking purposes after retirement. All you need to do is trade it to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻
The empty stall created after your animal retires can be used for raising other chocobos, so if you happen to come across another egg, you can bring it here to start all over again!≺Prompt≻
When your chocobo is mature enough, you can breed it with another chocobo. If the chocobo lays an egg, the chick will inherit the traits of its parents.≺Prompt≻

You will need ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ and ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ if you want to breed your chocobo. Apparently, you also need some kind of ticket that they sell at the stables in Upper Jeuno.≺Prompt≻

You can ask one of the VCS members to issue you a chococard, or if your chocobo is already retired, just trade them ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
I don't really know that much about it, but you should probably try matching your chocobo up with several different animals and seeing what the results are.≺Prompt≻

When your chocobo is mature enough, you can call it in the field using ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻.≺Prompt≻
You need to let a member of the VCS know which chocobo you want to respond to your call, because they must choose a saddle that fits your chocobo's attributes.≺Prompt≻
That also means that when your chocobo's attributes change or it learns a new ability, you should probably let the VCS member know, too.≺Prompt≻

When you want to register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field, trade ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻
Also, the ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻#≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻'s power will grow weak after you've used it several times.≺Prompt≻
If this happens, just trade it to a VCS member and they will give you a new one for a fee.≺Prompt≻

What would you like to ask about? ≺Selection Dialog≻≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Chococards. ≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻%ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. Nothing.≺Prompt≻

≺Unknown Parameter (Type: 80) 1≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ proves that you are your chocobo's caretaker.≺Prompt≻
With this card, you can register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field or get a chococard for matchmaking.≺Prompt≻
If you lose it, you won't be able to get another one, so keep it in a safe place!≺Prompt≻

You can use ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to call your chocobo in the field to use as a mount.≺Prompt≻
The more you use it, the weaker it will get, so eventually you will need to exchange it to a VCS member for a new one.≺Prompt≻

Only people who have been approved by the VCS President can get ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻, so good luck with that...≺Prompt≻
Chococards are documents that contain all the details about a chocobo's attributes and condition. They are divided into two types--one for each gender.≺Prompt≻
If you trade one to the person who's in charge of matchmaking, he'll introduce your animal to another chocobo.≺Prompt≻

Chococards contain information on the chocobo's attributes and condition at the time the card is issued, so be sure to get a new card before using this service or the match will be arranged based on out-of-date information.≺Prompt≻

If you want a chococard for a retired chocobo, then you must trade ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ to a VCS member.≺Prompt≻

Why not!? Our original plan was to establish locations across Vana'diel where people could test their birds' skills.≺Prompt≻
We felt that this would help us maintain breeder motivation, which in turn would ensure healthier, happier chocobos. A “win-win situation,” as we like to call it in the business.≺Prompt≻
However, as rumors of these new facilities began to leak out into the world, people began speculating about the possibility of officially sanctioned chocobo races...≺Prompt≻
The VCS could not ignore the voice of the masses, and it was not long before a meeting was held, a vote was taken, and the CRA was formed.≺Prompt≻
And that's why I'm here, trying to enlist you and other top breeders into our noble ranks.≺Prompt≻
Oh, and for our more seasoned veterans who feel there are no challenges left for them here at the track, the CRA has finished preparing a new race. And rumor has that it's a doozie!≺Prompt≻
First of all, your chocobo must be fully grown. It doesn't matter if you are still tending to it, or if it has been sent to pasture, as long as it is large enough to ride.≺Prompt≻

Next, you must bring me either ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$≺BAD CHAR: 8280≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ or ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 01≻ ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻$ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻. This is all I will require. There are no hidden fees.≺Prompt≻
As your chocobo develops, be sure to re-register it. This will ensure that your steed is provided with the equipment that most suits its current condition.≺Prompt≻
Finally, you may only register one chocobo at a time, but are free to register a new bird whenever you wish. You need only speak with me to make any necessary changes.≺Prompt≻
Once you have registered your chocobo and entered it in a competition, the CRA will proceed in assigning it a licensed jockey.≺Prompt≻
Before each race you will be given the opportunity to give the jockey specific orders on his or her riding style.≺Prompt≻
In addition to these orders, you can also provide the jockey with items to use while riding, as well as equipment to improve your chocobo's performance.≺Prompt≻

Before a race, you can also check the strengths and weaknesses of the other participating chocobos. It is recommended that you use this data when deciding on what orders to give, or which items to equip.≺Prompt≻
Depending on your chocobo's performance in select CRA-sanctioned races, you may or may not receive a prize consisting of VCS-mint ≺Set Color #5≻chocobucks≺Set Color #1≻.≺Prompt≻
Chocobucks can be used to purchase items, as well as upgrade your mount. Chocobucks are also required to participate in official races.≺Prompt≻
Currently, players can earn up to, but no more than, 1000 chocobucks. However, this may change without notice.≺Prompt≻
There are two main types of races.≺Prompt≻
The first type is called an ≺Set Color #5≻official race≺Set Color #1≻. To participate in one of these, you will require chocobucks.≺Prompt≻
Placing in an official race will earn you gil. The more races you complete, the more respected you will become in the breeder community.≺Prompt≻
You may also take part in an official race as often as needed to complete the specified objectives.≺Prompt≻

However, after some of the more grueling races, you may be required to wait before entering the next. This is to give your chocobo, as well as the others, an opportunity to rest before running again.≺Prompt≻
The second type of race is called a ≺Set Color #5≻free run≺Set Color #1≻. Unlike the official races, these can be run at any time, regardless of the results of a previous match.≺Prompt≻

You must pay a fee in gil to participate in free runs, but you will have the opportunity to earn chocobucks depending on your chocobo's performance. You can join as many free runs as you wish in a single day (Earth time), but extra fees may be required for each additional race. (Stable hands have to make a living, too!)≺Prompt≻
The CRA is split up into three racing teams representing Bastok, Windurst, and San d'Oria.≺Prompt≻
Each team has its own skilled jockeys, and offers unique services that cannot be obtained at the other two.≺Prompt≻
Breeders are allowed to register with any team they like, and may change their affiliation at any time.≺Prompt≻
In the event that you wish to leave a racing team, all official race results, as well as earned chocobucks, will be saved.≺Prompt≻
You never have to worry that your past accomplishments may be deleted and lost forever. You only need rejoin the team to restore all your old data.≺Prompt≻
Anyway, there is no harm in visiting all three racing teams to find which one suits you best (though I know you'll choose this one).≺Prompt≻
Ah, it says here that you are a member of the ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst] racing team.≺Prompt≻
Have you come today to change your affiliation?≺Prompt≻

Remember, you will not be able to use any chocobucks earned in ≺Multiple Choice (Parameter 0)≻[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst] here, and you will also lose any Solo Victory Points that you may have. Are you sure you want to go through with this?≺Prompt≻

Understood. But remember, we are always looking for great racers like you to join our team. If you ever change your mind, I'll be right here waiting.≺Prompt≻

While free runs usually have no specific objectives, the higher your chocobo places, the better the prize you will receive. We suggest you use these races to improve your skills before embarking on the more difficult official races.≺Prompt≻
Here is the information on the next race:≺Prompt≻
★Novice Race I★ Chocobos: 4 Objective: Place 3rd or higher≺Prompt≻
Use this race to learn the ropes. Try not to worry too much about the other chocobos, and concentrate on discovering your bird's strengths and weaknesses.≺Prompt≻
★Novice Race II★ Chocobos: 6 Objective: Place 3rd or higher≺Prompt≻
This time, your chocobo will be pitted against five opponents. Use your knowledge of your bird's strengths to provide the jockey with the most appropriate orders.≺Prompt≻
★Novice Race III★ Chocobos: 8 Objective: Place 3rd or higher≺Prompt≻
This race is quite similar to a free run in that there will be seven other chocobos racing against you. If you have one available, try equipping an item to improve your bird's performance.≺Prompt≻

Here you can sign up your race chocobo to take part in our races.≺Prompt≻
Please note that once you sign up for a race, you will be unable to compete again for a period of 20 hours (Earth time).≺Prompt≻
All right. First of all, we will have to choose a saddle for your mount.≺Prompt≻

Which saddle would you like to use? ≺Selection Dialog≻Lauan saddle. Ash saddle. Elm saddle. Brass saddle. Silver saddle. Mythril saddle. Grass saddle. Cotton saddle. Linen saddle. Rabbit hide saddle. Sheep leather saddle. Buffalo leather saddle. Quit.≺Prompt≻
A standard model, the lauan saddle will stabilize your chocobo's stride.≺Prompt≻
A standard model, the ash saddle will stabilize your chocobo's stride. It also increases your mount's endurance.≺Prompt≻
A standard model, the elm saddle will stabilize your chocobo's stride. It also increases your mount's endurance.≺Prompt≻
A bit on the hefty side, the brass saddle can be somewhat taxing on a chocobo's endurance. It compensates for this, however, by increasing the bird's strength.≺Prompt≻
A bit on the hefty side, the silver saddle can be somewhat taxing on a chocobo's endurance. It compensates for this, however, by increasing the bird's strength.≺Prompt≻
A bit on the hefty side, the mythril saddle can be somewhat taxing on a chocobo's endurance. It compensates for this, however, by increasing the bird's strength.≺Prompt≻
This lightweight grass saddle can create a marked improvement in physical performance. However, a chocobo will require some degree of discernment to reap its benefits.≺Prompt≻
This lightweight cotton saddle can create a marked improvement in physical performance. However, a chocobo will require some degree of discernment to reap its benefits.≺Prompt≻
This lightweight linen saddle can create a marked improvement in physical performance. However, a chocobo will require some degree of discernment to reap its benefits.≺Prompt≻
Crafted from the finest rabbit hide, this saddle can improve physical performance, but only for chocobos with at least moderate receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Crafted from the finest sheep leather, this saddle can improve physical performance, but only for chocobos with at least moderate receptivity.≺Prompt≻
Crafted from the finest buffalo leather, this saddle can improve physical performance, but only for chocobos with at least moderate receptivity.≺Prompt≻

All chocobet centers are capable of providing the same services.≺Prompt≻
The grandstand faces the racetrack itself, and allows spectators to sit and enjoy the races in comfort.≺Prompt≻
To get there, just follow the red carpet all the way through the betting area. You can't miss it.≺Prompt≻
The standard admission fee is ≺Numeric Parameter 0≻ gil. Patrons who possess ≺Possible Special Code: 01≻≺Possible Special Code: 05≻6ａ≺BAD CHAR: 80≻≺BAD CHAR: 80≻ may enter free of charge.≺Prompt≻
